item.title: About me
item.description: Hello World! I am Supriya. I see design as a way to communicate through a collaborative and experiential medium. I am driven more towards work that involves making and breaking, data, visualization, storytelling, experiments, explorations, game design strategies..(and blue food) . Currently working as a User Experience Specialist at MathWorks Bangalore, India. Here, we are trying to explore ways for users to have a smooth experience with the software and its complex strategies and functionalities.
